text: Michael Adolfo Fernández (born 9 February 1994, in San Juan) is a Puerto Rican footballer who played as a midfielder for Criollos de Caguas and he also played with Puerto Rican national team. == References == == External links == * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican footballers Category:Puerto Rico international footballers Category:Sportspeople from San Juan, Puerto Rico Category:Association football midfielders
title: Michael Fernández
